Author: Far-Set-371

Comment: There's several levels of briefings...how XXXX will be implemented, how XXXX item is used, how XXXX item is built, how to access XXXX item, etc.  It's all compartmentalized because the people using the XXXX don't need to know how it's built, the one's directing the use of XXXX don't need to know how to access it, and the one's accessing it don't need to know how or why it's being implemented.  And yes, over time, and constant use people will get an idea of each aspect of XXXX from above, but because of compartmentalization they still won't know for sure...and that there is the key point...it is all nebulous hear-say until one is briefed on a particular aspect of XXXX  So with that little bit of information...with regards to Musk, he has probably heard wind of XXXX while bouncing around in our government, and the briefing probably would have confirmed the existence of XXXX and then at the end of the briefing he would be handed a stack of papers to initial ensuring he understood that divulging anything he was briefed would put his life, liberty, and loss of money on the table for prosecution...either way, I'm glad he got stuffed before he got access to even that little bit of info.
